snippet: The Federal Security Service said the train’s driver, whom it detained, had received instructions on how to build a bomb from an Islamic State representative.
abstract: Russia's Federal Security Service announces it stifled plot to blow up commuter train and detained train's engineer on suspicion of connections to Islamic State.
lead_paragraph: The Federal Security Service said the train’s driver, whom it detained, had received instructions on how to build a bomb from an Islamic State representative.

headline.main: Russia Says It Prevented Train Bombing

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Islamic State in Iraq and Syria (ISIS)
